issue.title: [Rust] Implement From<ArrowError> for ParquetError
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11873](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11873). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be great to be able to raise an arrow error and have it automatically be converted to a parquet error.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11873?focusedCommentId=17296084) by Dominik Moritz (domoritz):*
Never mind, it's already there.
